elements.text: You recently ordered furniture online that you have to assemble yourself. You struggle to make out the diagrams and wonder if you are particularly struggling because of PD. You think to yourself that the manufacturer's instructions are bad, and this makes you...

elements.name: Assembling Furniture_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
